alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Orange County through 430 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over High Point, or near Matamoras, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Jervis, Cuddebackville, Otisville, Huguenot, Unionville, Deerpark, Westtown, Slate Hill and Pine Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
